<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<Map.Entry<Integer, Integer>> it = map.entrySet().iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
i = i + 1;
names.add(it.next().getValue());
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can access a Map<Integer, Integer> via index by using the key of the map. In this case, you can use the iterator to get the next entry and retrieve the value of the map by its key.
